author: Joe Concha
title: Pompeo: Countries must 'step up,' provide 'transparent' coronavirus information to save lives
description: Secretary of State Mike Pompeo, who has been critical of China's reporting of coronavirus cases, is calling on nations to "step up" efforts to share "accurate, transparent information" to help the world fight the pandemic...
